name: Stalwart Marksmanship adv
desc: Gain Weapon Advantage against Bows. While Unit has weapon advantage, x2 damage dealt, otherwise -50% Damage taken.
components: (combat_calcs.compute_advantage(unit, target, item, target.get_weapon()) and combat_calcs.compute_advantage(unit, target, item, target.get_weapon()).accuracy > 0)
